mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_TYPE_CD , ITEM_TYPE_NAME FROM ITEM_TYPE WHERE 1=1 AND ITEM_TYPE_CD = #{itemTypeCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM ( ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, STOCK_QUANTITY, ITEM_CATEGORY_ID, ITEM_TYPE_CD, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_IMAGE, ITEM_IMAGE_2 ) VALUES ( #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{stockQuantity}, #{itemCategoryId}, #{itemTypeCd}, #{itemContent}, #{itemImage}, #{itemImage2} )
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_NO FROM ITEM ORDER BY ITEM_NO DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT ITEM_NO , ITEM_PRICE , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_IMAGE , STOCK_QUANTITY , ITEM_CATEGORY_ID , ITEM_TYPE_CD , ITEM_CONTENT , ITEM_IMAGE_2 FROM ITEM WHERE 1=1 AND ITEM_TYPE_CD = #{itemTypeCd} ORDER BY ITEM_NO DESC;
SELECT ITEM_CATEGORY_ID, ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME FROM ITEM_CATEGORY WHERE 1=1 AND ITEM_CATEGORY_ID = #{itemCategoryId}
